document_notes.text:
This update for xterm fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2021-27135: Fixed buffer-overflow when clicking on selected utf8 text. (bsc#1182091)
document_notes.title: Details

notes.text: xterm before Patch #366 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (segmentation fault) via a crafted UTF-8 combining character sequence.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description

product_id: SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Basesystem 15 SP2:xterm-330-11.3.1

description.text: To install this SUSE Security Update use the SUSE recommended installation methods like YaST online_update or "zypper patch".
